item.description:
Eric VT's All-Day Daytrading Seminar - This Coming Saturday!

In response to requests, Eric from Vermont will run his All-Day Daytrading Seminar this coming Saturday, March 15th from 9 AM to 5 PM. In Eric VT's typical style this will be an energetic and enthusiastic workshop on the nuts & bolts of Daytrading.

Here are the facts:

  • The seminar will cover all aspects of Daytrading.
  • The seminar will provide greater in-depth coverage of details & thorough drill-downs on each criterion.
  • The seminar will provide extensive Q&A opportunity.
  • The room is amphitheater style with large screen projection, so you can see the "Real-Time 1-minute Charting" & "Price Pressure Trading" demonstrations.
  • Many trading websites will be visited with details explained.
  • Your specific trading questions will be answered.
  • Brokers' websites will be toured. The benefits of specialty websites will be explained.
  • GainsKeeper's Tax accounting website will be viewed live to import trades from brokers.


Cost: Eric VT has travel costs in coming from Vermont, so a contribution of $20 per person cash towards his travel costs is appreciated. Please bring exact bills so no change is needed.

Lunch: please bring a lunch & drink as we'll take a half hour lunch break mid-day.

Map: click these links to see the location map, Building E51 map & MIT free parking map:
http://tinyurl.com/ko...
http://whereis.mit.ed...
http://whereis.mit.ed...

DISCLAIMER: Anything Eric VT says or presents is NOT a suggestion to buy a particular stock, so do your own homework and make your own decisions. Any trades you make are at your own risk.
item.name: Eric VT's All-Day Daytrading Seminar
